dcterms:creator: C. Li
Y. Fan
L. Sun
dcterms:description: A dataset containing aerosol optical depth (AOD) measurements from MODIS, specifically the 1-km AOD product (MCD19A2) over Los Angeles, used for evaluating AOD reconstruction methods.
dcterms:title: MODIS AOD

dcterms:creator: R. O. Green
D. R. Thompson
dcterms:description: A dataset from the Earth Surface Mineral Dust Source Investigation (EMIT) instrument onboard the International Space Station, capturing AOD measurements with a spatial resolution of 60 m.
dcterms:title: EMIT AOD
